mapper.select: select calendar_date , site_type_id , availability_count , max_count from site_availability where site_type_id = #{siteTypeId} and calendar_date between #{from} and #{to}
select count(*) from site_availability where site_type_id = #{siteTypeId} and calendar_date between #{from} and #{to} and availability_count = 0
mapper.update: update site_availability set availability_count = availability_count - 1 where site_type_id = #{siteTypeId} and calendar_date between #{from} and #{to} and availability_count > 0
